scripts.test:node: yarn rollup:node && nyc --check-coverage --lines 100 --functions 100 --branches 100 mocha --bail test/*.test.js test/node/*.test.js
scripts.coverage:report: nyc --reporter html mocha --bail test/*.test.js test/node/*.test.js && open coverage/index.html
scripts.build: yarn install && yarn test && yarn rollup
scripts.release: yarn safe && yarn version && npm publish --registry 'https://registry.npmjs.org/'
scripts.docs:build: documentation build -f html -g -o docs && cp dist/awaiting.umd.js examples && cp -r examples docs
scripts.docs:release: yarn safe && git subtree push --prefix docs origin gh-pages
